title: 6g generates incorrect code for &^
body:
This code snippet demonstrates a compiler code generation bug for ^& expressions:
http://play.golang.org/p/XNu-bH1iK2
I haven't been able to determine the root cause, but functions F and G should be
identical; they are not.
I have included the ASM listing for your convenience.

I really wasn't expecting this to be the reason for my failing test. :(
